mdRecord.dcterms:title: VA Fire & Marine Insurance Company Policy
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Virginia Fire and Marine Insurance Company Policy No. 633967 under Agent A.J. Tice for the Assured T.H. Howard covering his granary, barn & stable all situated on the North side of Main St. Floyd, VA. The policy was signed February 6th, 1905, and covered up to $200 for one year with a Premium of $3.30.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Insurance
Insurance certificates
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
